snippet.title: [EN] "Netcorter: City 2179" Game announce teaser (2021)
snippet.description:
Add to Steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1616260/NETCORTER_CITY_2179/
NETCORTER: CITY 2179 is a sci-fi storytelling third-person shooter(TPS) with a cyberpunk aesthetic and Bullet Hell and Roguelite elements.
You would become a Netcorter (S-class hacker) and dive into a chain of events that followed the disaster in 2178.
The game is being developed by us, a small indie 2PWR TEAM, in the near future we plan to go on Kickstarter.
--
Site: https://netcorter.com/
--
We on social media:
https://twitter.com/Netcorter
https://www.facebook.com/NetcorterCity2179/
https://www.instagram.com/NetcorterCity2179/
